metadata.title: CVE-2022-31607 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer (nvidia.ko), where a local user with basic capabilities cancause improper input validation, which may lead to denial of service,escalation of privileges, data tampering, and limited informationdisclosure.
